Text: I'm back, Gamma.

Welcome back, Zeta. What's the current status of
the Cult's decoy unit?

After confirming their clash with the Templars' ambush
unit, Beta and Delta intervened immediately and
engaged in combat.
I see...
...Wait, what?!

Hold on... I instructed Beta to exhaust both sides
and take them out simultaneously only when the
time was right!
Maybe she couldn't keep Delta in check—

No, look, this is gonna be bad news from your point
of view, but...Beta killed one of the Templars right
off the bat, and that's when all hell broke loose.

When the arrow meant to direct that dumb dog to her
prey ends up killing the prey instead, well, of course,
she won't take kindly to that.

So that dumb dog charged at the enemy with all
her strength, throwing the entire battlefield into
disarray...and that about sums it up.
Unbelievable... How could this happen?!

But you didn't send that dumb dog with the unit
targeting the main convoy because you foresaw
this happening, right?

If that's the case, I assume it's all still going
according to your plan.

Sure, but I wanted to cover all bases and eliminate
as many variables as possible...! I never expected
Beta to be so volatile!
...Well, the result is the same, so who cares?

As far as I'm concerned, with you stepping back from
the battlefield and concentrating solely on keeping
a firm grasp on the operation's progress, I think
this mission is perfectly winnable.
You see it that way as well? That means a lot to me—

...Wait! Hold on, Zeta! Why does it sound like you're
suggesting we stand a better chance without me on
the battlefield?

It doesn't "sound" like that's what I'm suggesting,
it's exactly what I'm saying.

Frankly, the way I see it, your presence on the
battlefield is far more of an unknown factor than
the simple-minded outbursts of that stupid dog!
You've got some nerve saying that to my face!

Look, sorry. What I mean to say is you're best suited
for your current role.

Your position of commanding each unit according to
our planned strategy and utilizing optimal tactics
based on real-time circumstances is similar to your
role as Luna at Mitsugoshi, isn't it?

In other words, your talents are most effectively
utilized by standing firm behind the scenes and
tracking battle conditions.

I honestly believe that, and I believe Lady Alpha
told you to take command of the entire operation
because...we can't afford to mess up this mission.
Grrr!

W-Well, anyway! We ran into an unforeseen hiccup,
but it's all within the scope of our anticipated course
of action!

It should be time for Eta and Lambda to cut off the
main convoy's retreat. Zeta, are you ready?
You bet!

We can't screw this up. If that prophetess shows
up...I'll finish her.
Zeta...
Right, I'm off then.

It's unusual to see her so angry...or should I say
"worked up."
